head: Iced Belgium chocolate latte
description: Espresso with richly flavoured Belgium chocolate sauce, mocha sauce and steamed milk served over ice. Topped with chocolate whipped cream and dark chocolate chips.

head: Caff√® Latte
description: This is the original coffeehouse classic. And like most classics,  apart of its appeal comes from its simplicity. Some prefer to add syrup or extra espresso to the recipe.

head: Espresso Frappuccino
description: Coffee is combined with a shot of espresso and milk, then blended with ice to give you a nice little jolt and lots of sipping joy.
